prompt:
Create an engaging title for your favorite movie using only one word. Explain why you chose this title.
Title: "Vision"
Movie: Inception (2010)
Explanation: The movie "Inception" explores the themes of dreams, reality, and memory, which I feel accurately reflects the meaning behind my chosen one-word title "Vision". The word "vision" also represents the protagonist's journey to uncovering the truth and understanding the complexities of his own mind.
